title: ViewAccessibilityProperties
description: Compact representation of accessibility features for a view

text_size.description: Userâ€™s preferred text scale relative to the default system size.

screen_reader_enabled.description: Indicates whether a screen reader is currently active.

bold_text_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide bold text accessibility setting is enabled.

reduce_transparency_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide reduce transparency setting is enabled.

reduce_motion_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide reduce motion setting is enabled.

button_shapes_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide button shapes setting is enabled.

invert_colors_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide color inversion setting is enabled.

increase_contrast_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide increase contrast setting is enabled.

assistive_switch_enabled.description: Indicates whether an alternative input method like Switch Control or Switch Access is currently enabled.

assistive_touch_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide AssistiveTouch feature is currently enabled.

video_autoplay_enabled.description: Indicates whether the video autoplay setting is enabled in the system or application.

closed_captioning_enabled.description: Indicates whether closed captioning is enabled for media playback.

mono_audio_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide mono audio setting is enabled.

shake_to_undo_enabled.description: Indicates whether the Shake to Undo feature is enabled.

reduced_animations_enabled.description: Indicates whether the user prefers reduced animations or cross-fade transitions.

should_differentiate_without_color.description: Indicates whether the system should differentiate interface elements without relying solely on color.

grayscale_enabled.description: Indicates whether the device display is currently using grayscale mode.

single_app_mode_enabled.description: Indicates whether the device is currently locked to a single app through Guided Access or Screen Pinning.

on_off_switch_labels_enabled.description: Indicates whether on/off switch labels are enabled in the system settings.

speak_screen_enabled.description: Indicates whether the Speak Screen feature is enabled.

speak_selection_enabled.description: Indicates whether the text-to-speech selection feature is enabled.
